entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
